title: Hi; Is it legal to park a trailer, unattached to a vehicle, on the side of a street? My trailer shows an advetisement
question: I live in Pomona, CA
question_tags: Bankruptcy,Debt,Bankruptcy and debt,Transportation law,State, local, and municipal law
answers: The City of Pomona may have a local ordinance. Contact the city and ask them.
You might want to consider resisting your question in the Transportation or State, Local & Municipal Law sections rather than in the Bankruptcy / Debt practice areas. Good luck!
